torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with jackal-like Lucario fur. [npc.Her] new fur is a notably lighter shade than the rest of [npc.her] body, and a hard spike juts out from the center of [npc.her] chest.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] Lucario, [npc.skinFullDescription].
torso.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] torso has [npc.a_femininity(true)] appearance, and is [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.skinFullDescription(true)]. A spike juts out from the center of the chest.
